question: A friend of yours is thinking of going on a camping holiday for the first time this summer. He/she has asked for your advice.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter,•	explain why you think your friend would enjoy a camping holiday•	describe some possible disadvantages•	say whether you would like to go camping with your friend this summerWrite at least 150 words.
text: I hope you’re doing well. I’m just writing with regard to your upcoming vacation camp.

I believe that you would have  great camping. As you are  fond of outdoor camping, this vacation is going to be fabulous for you. Since, you never have any experience of flora and fauna, from this trip you are going to experience tons of happiness.

This type of holiday, however, is not without its drawbacks. The first one is that you have to share the bathrooms with your camping partners as there is only have one temporary restroom. As there is not have any single eatery sites nearby, you have to cook food by yourself only.
I really wish I could join you, but as you know summer is my busy season. I must go with you in winter if you would have a plan for winter.
Please let me know if you have got more questions. I look forward to hearing from you once you get back from your trip.
